name: arraySum
description:
The sum of values in an array. If the array parameter value is
 an empty array, returns zero.

params.name: array
params.description: An array name or variable name

examples.title: Sum of values in an array
examples.description: Uses the arraySum function to get sum of values in an array

examples.title: Sum of values in an array
examples.description: To get sum of values in an empty array

examples.title: Sum of values in an array
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Uses the sum member function is the same as running arraySum.

examples.title: Sum the values in a numeric Query column (first transformed into an array)
examples.description: Get the total of a query column by using valueArray() and then using the sum() member function
